verbs.description: if [ARG0: you] [V: collect] [ARG1: books] but never get around to reading them there a word for that if you 're in the habit of collecting books and never reading them you might have what the japanese call tsundoku the term is used to describe someone who owns a lot of unread literature a edward newton mori senzo andrew gerstle bibliomania tsundoku japan university of london
